text: Abantu bahawe igitabu bashaka yuko ubamanurira igitabu kivuye mw’ijuru, mu vy’ukuri barasavye intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) ibisumba ivyo bavuga bati:- nutwereke Imana imbona nkubone, baca bafatwa n’umuriro w’inkuba kubera ubuhakanyi bwabo, hanyuma bagira intama munyuma yaho bamaze gushikirwa n’ivyemezo biri k’umugaragaro, mugabo tugira ikigongwe kuri ivyo nuguha intumwa y’Imana Mussa (iii) ivyemezo biri k’umugaragaro kuribo
